questionTitle: A ........................ is a person who lends money to others.

He works ........................ a worker in the hotel.

We are ........................ to help whenever we are asked .
I couldn't help .................. at some of his remarks.
She ........................ herself as an old beggar to enter Tibet.
Look up and you will see ...................
Mrs. Green ......................... all her life to teaching orphans.
It's often made of iron and can lead into a garden. It's ...................
"To ........................ someone" means "to put someone into prison".
I think Mauritius is my favourite ............. on earth.
